fraseIngles: I need to put the milk in the refrigerator.
frasePortugues: Eu preciso colocar o leite na geladeira.

fraseIngles: She is cooking dinner on the stove.
frasePortugues: Ela está cozinhando o jantar no fogão.

fraseIngles: Heat the food in the microwave for two minutes.
frasePortugues: Aqueça a comida no micro-ondas por dois minutos.

fraseIngles: The cake is baking in the oven.
frasePortugues: O bolo está assando no forno.

fraseIngles: Please load the dishes into the dishwasher.
frasePortugues: Por favor, coloque os pratos na lava-louças.

fraseIngles: Use the blender to make a smoothie.
frasePortugues: Use o liquidificador para fazer um vitamina.

fraseIngles: Put the bread in the toaster.
frasePortugues: Coloque o pão na torradeira.

fraseIngles: I make coffee every morning with my coffee maker.
frasePortugues: Eu faço café toda manhã com minha cafeteira.

fraseIngles: Cut the vegetables with a sharp knife.
frasePortugues: Corte os vegetais com uma faca afiada.

fraseIngles: Eat the pasta with a fork.
frasePortugues: Coma o macarrão com um garfo.

fraseIngles: Stir the soup with a wooden spoon.
frasePortugues: Mexa a sopa com uma colher de madeira.

fraseIngles: Serve the food on a clean plate.
frasePortugues: Sirva a comida em um prato limpo.

fraseIngles: Pour the cereal into the bowl.
frasePortugues: Despeje o cereal na tigela.

fraseIngles: Drink your tea from this cup.
frasePortugues: Beba seu chá desta xícara.

fraseIngles: Fill the glass with water.
frasePortugues: Encha o copo com água.

fraseIngles: Cook the eggs in a non-stick pan.

fraseIngles: Chop the onions on the cutting board.

fraseIngles: Flip the pancakes with a spatula.

fraseIngles: Beat the eggs with a whisk.
frasePortugues: Bata os ovos com um batedor.

fraseIngles: Open the can with the can opener.
frasePortugues: Abra a lata com o abridor de latas.

fraseIngles: Use a measuring cup for the flour.

fraseIngles: Wash the dishes in the sink.

fraseIngles: Turn on the faucet to get water.

fraseIngles: Throw the trash in the garbage can.
frasePortugues: Jogue o lixo na lixeira.

fraseIngles: Store the ice cream in the freezer.
frasePortugues: Guarde o sorvete no congelador.

fraseIngles: Boil water in the kettle for tea.

fraseIngles: Drain the pasta in the colander.

fraseIngles: Roll the dough with a rolling pin.

fraseIngles: Use tongs to flip the meat.

fraseIngles: Serve the soup with a ladle.
frasePortugues: Sirva a sopa com uma concha.

fraseIngles: Peel the potatoes with a peeler.

fraseIngles: Use a strainer to filter the tea.

fraseIngles: Mix the ingredients in a large mixing bowl.

fraseIngles: Place the cookies on the baking sheet.

fraseIngles: Bake the lasagna in a casserole dish.

fraseIngles: Keep the coffee hot in the thermos.
frasePortugues: Mantenha o café quente na garrafa térmica.

fraseIngles: Fill the ice cube tray with water.
frasePortugues: Encha a forma de gelo com água.

fraseIngles: Set the timer for 30 minutes.
frasePortugues: Configure o timer para 30 minutos.

fraseIngles: Wear an apron to protect your clothes.
frasePortugues: Use um avental para proteger suas roupas.

fraseIngles: Use oven mitts to handle hot dishes.
frasePortugues: Use luvas de forno para manusear pratos quentes.

fraseIngles: Pass me the salt shaker, please.
frasePortugues: Passe-me o saleiro, por favor.

fraseIngles: Grind fresh pepper with the pepper mill.
frasePortugues: Moa pimenta fresca com o moedor de pimenta.

fraseIngles: Follow the recipe in the cookbook.
frasePortugues: Siga a receita no livro de receitas.

fraseIngles: Weigh the flour on the kitchen scale.
frasePortugues: Pese a farinha na balança da cozinha.

fraseIngles: Keep the utensils in the drawer.
frasePortugues: Guarde os utensílios na gaveta.

fraseIngles: Open the wine bottle with a corkscrew.

fraseIngles: Crush the spices with mortar and pestle.
frasePortugues: Esmague as especiarias com o pilão.

fraseIngles: Place the cutting mat under the cutting board.
frasePortugues: Coloque o tapete de corte embaixo da tábua de corte.

fraseIngles: Clean the counter with a dishrag.

fraseIngles: Replace the paper towels in the holder.

fraseIngles: Put the lid on the pot.

fraseIngles: Fill the pitcher with juice.

frasePortugues: Coloque a xícara no pires.

fraseIngles: Cover the table with a tablecloth.

fraseIngles: Wipe your mouth with a napkin.

fraseIngles: Use a coaster under your glass.

frasePortugues: Sirva os pãezinhos em uma cesta de pão.

fraseIngles: Add sugar from the sugar bowl.
frasePortugues: Adicione açúcar do açucareiro.

fraseIngles: Pour milk from the creamer.
frasePortugues: Despeje leite da leiteira.

fraseIngles: Keep butter fresh in the butter dish.
frasePortugues: Mantenha a manteiga fresca na manteigueira.

fraseIngles: Beat the eggs with an egg beater.
frasePortugues: Bata os ovos com uma batedeira de ovos.

fraseIngles: Sift the flour through a sifter.
frasePortugues: Peneire a farinha através de uma peneira fina.

fraseIngles: Cut the meat on the chopping block.

fraseIngles: Dry the lettuce in the salad spinner.
frasePortugues: Seque a alface no centrifugador de salada.

fraseIngles: Keep the drinks cold in the ice bucket.
frasePortugues: Mantenha as bebidas geladas no balde de gelo.

fraseIngles: Bake the cake in a round cake pan.
frasePortugues: Asse o bolo em uma forma redonda de bolo.

fraseIngles: Make muffins in the muffin tin.
frasePortugues: Faça cupcakes na forma de cupcake.

fraseIngles: Bake pizza on a pizza stone.
frasePortugues: Asse pizza em uma pedra de pizza.

fraseIngles: Cook stew in the slow cooker all day.
frasePortugues: Cozinhe ensopado na panela elétrica o dia todo.

fraseIngles: Cook beans quickly in the pressure cooker.
frasePortugues: Cozinhe feijão rapidamente na panela de pressão.

fraseIngles: Make bread dough with the stand mixer.
frasePortugues: Faça massa de pão com a batedeira planetária.

fraseIngles: Whip cream with the hand mixer.
frasePortugues: Bata creme com a batedeira de mão.

fraseIngles: Make fresh orange juice with the juicer.
frasePortugues: Faça suco de laranja fresco com o espremedor de frutas.

fraseIngles: Put food scraps in the garbage disposal.
frasePortugues: Coloque restos de comida no triturador de lixo.

fraseIngles: Store dry goods in the pantry.
frasePortugues: Guarde produtos secos na despensa.

fraseIngles: Keep dishes in the kitchen cabinet.
frasePortugues: Guarde pratos no armário da cozinha.

fraseIngles: Place spices on the shelf.
frasePortugues: Coloque temperos na prateleira.

fraseIngles: Prepare food on the kitchen counter.
frasePortugues: Prepare comida na bancada da cozinha.

fraseIngles: Clean the backsplash after cooking.
frasePortugues: Limpe o azulejo da parede depois de cozinhar.

frasePortugues: Pendure a lista de compras com um ímã de geladeira.

frasePortugues: Mantenha o livro de receitas aberto com um suporte para receitas.

fraseIngles: Slice vegetables thinly with the mandoline.

frasePortugues: Verifique se o frango está pronto com um termômetro de carne.

fraseIngles: Clean the counter with a dough scraper.

fraseIngles: Stir-fry vegetables in the wok.

fraseIngles: Cook pancakes on the griddle.
frasePortugues: Cozinhe panquecas na chapa.

fraseIngles: Roast the turkey in a roasting pan.
frasePortugues: Asse o peru em uma assadeira grande.

frasePortugues: Faça sopa em um caldeirão grande.

fraseIngles: Heat the sauce in a small saucepan.

fraseIngles: Fry eggs in the cast iron skillet.

fraseIngles: Serve dessert in individual ramekins.
frasePortugues: Sirva sobremesa em ramequins individuais.

fraseIngles: Cool cookies on the cooling rack.
frasePortugues: Esfrie biscoitos na grade de resfriamento.

frasePortugues: Misture massa de pão com o gancho de massa.

fraseIngles: Cream butter with the paddle attachment.
frasePortugues: Bata manteiga com o batedor tipo pá.

fraseIngles: Whip cream with the whip attachment.
frasePortugues: Bata creme com o batedor tipo fouet.

fraseIngles: Blend soup with an immersion blender.
frasePortugues: Bata sopa com um mixer de mão.

fraseIngles: Extract lemon juice with a citrus juicer.
frasePortugues: Extraia suco de limão com um espremedor de cítricos.

fraseIngles: Crush garlic with a garlic press.
frasePortugues: Esmague alho com um espremedor de alho.

frasePortugues: Quebre nozes com um quebra-nozes.
